column1: Smoque BBQ////I love that this place follows the rule of  "Nothing to Hide
column2: Sauce on the Side" and they do it well. I will admit
column3: the portions of the sides (cornbread instead of slaw and mac & cheese) were small but tasted really good
column4: and the fries were good & plenty of them.  BYOB - love it!  Can't wait to try their sandwiches!
